mapper.select: SELECT emp_no empNo, emp_pw empPw, emp_name empName, emp_dept empDept, emp_grade empGrade, use_yn useYN FROM employee WHERE use_yn = 'Y' AND emp_no = #{strId}

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO commute_history( commute_no, emp_no, start_time, end_time, reg_time, mod_time, reg_id, mod_id, use_yn )VALUES( CURRENT_TIMESTAMP(5), #{empNo}, NOW(), NULL, NOW(), NOW(), #{empNo}, #{empNo}, 'Y' )
mapper.update: UPDATE commute_history SET end_time = NOW() WHERE emp_no = #{empNo} AND DATE(start_time) = CURDATE() AND end_time IS NULL
